title: My first note
content: Hello, this is my first backend app. I use nodejs, javascript, css, ejs, and expressjs.

title: 2nd Note
content: Hey, this is my second note!

title: In Stillness
content:
In quiet hours the mind takes flight,
Beyond the grasp of day and night.
A thought, a spark, a silent thread—
The world within speaks loud instead.

No need for noise, no race to run,
Some truths emerge when there is none.
So pause, reflect, let stillness grow—
The deepest roots are those below.

This note was made to test the length of the note.

title: Add Dates
content: I added a function to save the date of the note's creation.
